page.title: 15Liverpool Newsham,Trade
page.content: Most trade is carried out through retail outlets run by one man located along main roads. The majority sell food. Non_food shops supply all the area requires to maintain it's life style, including equipment needed for leisure pursuits.Each shopping area has at least one shop that provides ready_to_eat food. Where there has been rebuilding during the last fifteen years, supermarkets and precincts cater for local population. It's still possible to find small groups of stalls set up in the open air. The wholesale fruit, veg. and flower market supplies retailers from all over Merseyside and North Wales. The Stanley Abattoir, a wholesale meat market, supplies butchers. Cash and Carry wholesalers supply retailers with preserved and frozen food and some non-food items.
